title: Piazza Duomo
description: Piazza del Duomo is a city square in Catania, Italy.

title: Stadio Angelo Massimino
description: Stadio Angelo Massimino (previously known as Stadio Cibali) is a multi-use stadium in Catania, Italy.

title: Teatro Massimo Bellini
description: The Teatro Massimo Bellini is an opera house in Catania, Sicily, southern Italy.

title: Giardino Bellini
description:
The Giardino Bellini (also known as Villa Bellini; English translation:
 'Bellini Garden') is the oldest urban park of Catania.

title: ASD Scacchi Catania
description: Chess clubs often provide for both informal and tournament games and sometimes offer league play.
